poh_unsupported_network: Red no soportada. Por favor cambiar a {{network}} y refrescar.
header_notifications_subscribe: Suscribite para obtener actualizaciones de los registros en los que estas involucrado.
header_notifications_valid_email: El Email tiene que ser valid.
gasless_vouch_cost: Asegurar un perfil no tiene costo. Tenga cuidado con los estafadores que pretenden cobrar por ese tipo de acciones.
profile_card_maintenance: Estamos haciendo trabajo de mantinimiento y volveremos en poco tiempo.
profile_share_vouching_title: Registrate y valida a este perfil en Proof Of Humanity.
profile_share_check_out_title: Mira este perfil en Proof Of Humanity.
profile_card_video_check: Por favor verificar el video antes de validar este registro.
profile_card_something_wrong: Hay algun problema con este registro?
profile_card_save_deposit_text: Todavia hay tiempo para salvar el deposito del registrado! Enviale un email a <0>{{email}}</0>. Podrias estar salvando el deposito del registrado!
profile_card_challenge_not_duplicate_of_: Un registro no puede ser duplicado de si mismo.
profile_card_challenge_should_be_registe: Un supuesto duplicado debe estar registered o con registro pendiente.
profile_card_vouch_text:
Asegúrate de que la persona exista y de que te hayas encontrado físicamente
. Tenga en cuenta que, en el caso de una disputa, si un envío se
 rechaza por motivo "Duplicado" o "No existente", todos los que
 habían respondido por ello serán eliminados del registro. Tenga en cuenta que
 su validacion solo se contará cuando y mientras esté
 registrado, y otro envío no este utilizando su validacion.
profile_card_finalize_registration: Finalizar registro y empezar a acumular
profile_card_vouches_in_use: Validaciones en uso en otro registro
profile_card_vouches_used: Todos las validaciones otorgadas a este registro están siendo utilizados por otros registros. Espere a que resuelvan o solicite que otra persona con una validacion libre pueda validarlo.
profile_evidence_file_size: El archivo debe ser de {{max_size}} o menos
profile_evidence_example_placeholder: Ej. El registrado no es una persona real.
profile_evidence_advice:
Solo envia evidencia si crees que el registro es correcto
 como esta. Enviar archivos como evidencia no ayudara si los originales son incorrectos.
submit_profile_title: Create your Proof of Humanity profile
submit_profile_create_wallet: You don't have a wallet connected to the website
submit_profile_wallet_help: Don't have a wallet? Click <0>here</0> to learn on how to create one!
submit_profile_initial_title: Create your Proof Of Humanity Profile
submit_profile_initial_description: Submitting your profile to Proof of Humanity takes an average of 5-10 minutes, an existing Ethereum account and requires you to record a video of yourself talking.
submit_profile_tornado_cash: Learn how to increase your privacy with Tornado Cash
submit_profile_sensitive_info: I understand this wallet will be irreversebly linked to my real world person and I will not use that wallet for any private or sensitive information.
submit_profile_info_description: Registering to Proof of Humanity requires you to set a name. You can use a pseudonym if you feel more comfortable.
submit_profile_info_bio_placeholder: Where you are from, how old you are, what things you like, etc
submit_profile_image_description:
If you have a camera, you may take a picture directly from your device.
Take out any masks, sunglasses or anything that could block your face and look straight at the camera.
submit_profile_image_crop_description: Make sure your face is centered and not rotated.
submit_profile_image_size_error: The cropped area must be greater than 256 pixels
submit_profile_image_grayscale: Image can't be black and white, please choose or take another one
submit_profile_image_verify_description:
Make sure <0>your facial features are visible</0> and that <1>you're not covered under heavy make up, masks or other coverings.</1>
You also must be looking straight at the camera.
submit_profile_video_description: You must be in a quiet room, with a working microphone and be able to read from your screen. If you are unable to comply, then an alternative process is available.
submit_profile_video_by_voice: I am able to identify my account using my voice and sight
submit_profile_video_visual: I would prefer to use a visual method
submit_profile_video_ready_title: Get ready to say your bit!
submit_profile_video_ready_help: Speak the words as they appear on the screen
submit_profile_video_too_long: The selected file should be shorter than two minutes
submit_profile_video_too_big: The selected file exceeds the size limit of 15MB
submit_profile_video_phrase: Certifico que soy un ser humano real y no estoy registrado en este registro.
submit_profile_finalize_description: Verify your submission information and media is correct and submit the transaction to register.
submit_profile_finalize_loading_picture: Your picture is loading, please wait...
submit_profile_finalize_loading_video: Your video is loading, please wait...
submit_profile_finalize_video_check: Please check your whole video to be able to send the submission.
submit_profile_finalize_crowdfund: I want to use Crowdfund (no self deposit)
submit_profile_finalize_selffund: I want to fund my own submission
submit_profile_nextsteps_description: But it's not over yet! Here are the next steps before you can start receiving UBI.
submit_profile_nextsteps_vouch_help: You need at least one existing member to vouch for you.
submit_profile_nextsteps_deposit_help: You need to find people who are willing to pay for your deposit.
submit_profile_nextsteps_crowdvoucher_gr: Join the crowdvoucher group on Telegram
submit_profile_nextsteps_crowdfunding_gr: Join the crowdfunding group on Telegram
submit_profile_file_not_supported: The selected file type is not supported
